problem_summary_simple: Find the index where the sum of elements to its left equals the sum of elements to its right.
problem_summary_technical: Calculates the total sum, then iterates, maintaining a left sum and checking if left_sum equals total_sum - left_sum - current_element.
key_insights: Pre-calculating the total sum optimizes the check for each index.
The condition `left_sum == (total - left_sum - num)` efficiently checks the pivot condition.
The leftmost pivot index is returned, so the iteration order matters.
